title: Episode #46: Benjamin Wittes Speaks at Hoover on "Speaking the Law"
itunes:title: Episode #46: Benjamin Wittes Speaks at Hoover on "Speaking the Law"
itunes:subtitle: Benjamin Wittes speaks on his and Kenneth Anderson's book, Speaking the Law, at an October 25 media colloquium at the Hoover Institution.
description:
Benjamin Wittes speaks on his and Kenneth Anderson's book, Speaking the Law, at an October 25 media colloquium at the Hoover Institution.
